comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Implemented fork-side fix package for this issue:

- upstream PR: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/pull/3118
- change summary:
  - when RDP raises `OnLeaveFullScreenMode`, mRemoteNG now restores main form (if minimized), activates it, and refocuses the active session control
  - reduces cases where mRemoteNG falls behind other windows after leaving fullscreen via RDP bar
- fork CI evidence:
  - https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/actions/runs/21789549099
